original_title: UFC Fight Night 101: Whittaker vs. Brunson
overview: UFC Fight Night 101: Whittaker vs. Brunson was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on November 27, 2016 at Rod Laver Arena in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. A middleweight bout between The Ultimate Fighter: The Smashes welterweight winner Robert Whittaker and Derek Brunson was elevated to serve as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 101: Whittaker vs. Brunson
